metadata.title: CVE-2024-46832 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:MIPS: cevt-r4k: Don't call get_c0_compare_int if timer irq is installedThis avoids warning:[    0.118053] BUG: sleeping function called from invalid context atkernel/locking/mutex.c:283Caused by get_c0_compare_int on secondary CPU.We also skipped saving IRQ number to struct clock_event_device *cd asit's never used by clockevent core, as per comments it's only meantfor "non CPU local devices".
